Features

Self‑Improving

Agents continuously analyze, invent, and evolve automations.

Repo Sync

Changes are committed and pushed automatically to main.

Zero Ops

Runs fully in the cloud—no servers or manual intervention.

Safety‑First

Conservative edits with logs, reports, and guardrails.

Scalable

Generates domain‑specific factories on demand.

Observability

Dashboards, reports, and GitHub Actions artifacts.

How it works

Discover
Scan code, issues, UX, and ops signals
Plan
Draft safe, high‑impact improvements
Apply
Open edits with conservative diffs
Validate
Audit builds, links, a11y, and performance

Capabilities

Code Quality & Refactors

Lints, fixes, and proposes refactors with type‑safety improvements.

Performance & A11y

Optimizes bundles, assets, and accessibility with continuous checks.

Content & SEO

Curates content, updates promotions, and tunes metadata for reach.

Benefits

24/7 progress without human intervention
Rapid feedback loop with safe, incremental edits
Continuous delivery directly to main branch
Fewer regressions via layered checks and reports
